perturbation.original_text: This agreement shall begin upon the date of its execution by MA and acceptance in writing by Company and shall remain in effect until the end of the current calendar year and shall be automatically renewed for successive one (1) year periods unless otherwise terminated according to the cancellation or termination provisions contained in paragraph 18 of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: This agreement shall begin upon the date of its execution by MA and acceptance in writing by Company and shall remain in effect until the end of the current calendar year. Renewal of this agreement will depend on the company's annual quota and if the MA meets the requirements or standards.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the contract auto-renews. The modified version makes renewal uncertain by introducing the condition of meeting requirements or standards.

perturbation.original_text: MA agrees to pay Company, in the manner and at the time specified below, the fee(s) on Company’s current price list in effect at the time an order is received by Company as set forth in Schedule A.
perturbation.changed_text: MA agrees to pay Company, in the manner and at the time specified below, the fee(s) on Company’s current price list or a different price agreed by both companies in written.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated that the fee is based on the company's price. The modified version introduces the possibility of a different written agreement, contradicting the initial price-list requirement.

perturbation.original_text: MA may not assign, sell, lease or otherwise transfer in whole or in party any of the rights granted pursuant to this Agreement without prior written approval of Company.
perturbation.changed_text: MA may assign, sell, lease or otherwise transfer in whole or in party any of the rights granted pursuant to this Agreement to any party of their choosing.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specified that assignment, sale, or lease should have a prior written approval of the company. The modified version states that the MA may assign the rights to any party, regardless of the company's permission.
